lines.text: Well, Fjord carrying Yasha, I have to kill him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or silence him? No one [INAUDIBLE] him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much damage is that, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 39? Prince of necrotic half of that into 18.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm actually just going to crawl against the wall even further just to try and to be out of his sight.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: OK, am I going to take? I'm going to take the attacks against him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because Jester is on the opposite side of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus a four if you want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a lot of R & D.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I get advantage on the second hit as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you're a natural-- that's a critical.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 2d6 times two, plus and an extra d6 and then your modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, for the [INAUDIBLE] You going to be plus?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been a while, bear with her, folks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your rage damage at this level is I think is plus two plus three? Plus three at this level, plus your strength modifier, which is plus--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do it? [CHEERING]

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: OK, I want to do something very bad.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is he trying to wait for me, or was he looking at me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then out of the corner of his eye, he sees you approach over the shoulder.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But I kind of want to reach up to the top of his wings, and I want to pull them off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And this low vibration takes the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you hear a [SNARLING GIBBERISH] Any of you speak Abyssal?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I look him in the face, and I say, did you hear that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Obann the Punished rises, a mass of black, blue, and dark, deep green tentacles and teeth and eyes, cursed now with a punished form from the Chained Oblivion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's got tongues! It's got eyes hanging off of tendrils.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't like any of this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like the Laughing Hand but worse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we'll pick up from there next week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe the Inevitable End will help us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we'll come back first week of December, and pick up this crazy chaos.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got to get the fuck out of here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, right? Like we're all tapped.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it comes over, and it's like [SLURPING]..

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm on the edge of tapped.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Matt, those maps were fucking amazing!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is a whole other thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is just a shred of whatever remained of him being twisted and left as a final fuck you from Tharizdun.
